statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' AND page_views > 10
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE page_views > 1000 OR behavior_type = 'logout';
DELETE FROM anomaly_detection WHERE detection_id = 500 AND user_id = 201;
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 100 AND session_id = 500;
DELETE FROM anomaly_detection WHERE detection_id = 10 AND user_id = 200 AND anomaly_type = 'malicious';
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Suspicious' AND anomaly_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'click' AND user_id = 123;
DELETE FROM login_history WHERE login_time < '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 456;
